billhistory.lastaction: 03/23/2017 H Referred to Special Purpose Districts: Mar 23 2017 11:29AM
billhistory.caption: Relating to the creation of the Lago Bello Municipal Utility District No. 1 of Harris County; granting a limited power of eminent domain; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose assessments, fees, and taxes.

subjects.subject: LAGO BELLO MUNICIPAL UTILITY DISTRICT NO. 1 OF HARRIS COUNTY (D1414)
Special Districts & Authorities--Municipal Utility Districts (I0009)
Special Districts & Authorities--Water & Utility (I0755)
